Articles.Content: Creating a really big Minmus with a lot of Steel Gun ruins, until T-Series claimed it, while i wait silently to get it.

haha

no
Hahano Hill is not possessed.
in that case, I possess it. MINEMINEMINE...

> 
> 
> 51 minutes ago, Kerballing (Got Dunked On) said:
> 
> 
> MINEMINEMINE...
> 

KABOOMKABOOMKABOOM...

A Free Minefield Hill.

<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">And I claim it. My minefield hill, with added Klamperture Science Minefield- and Bomb-proof shields.</font>

**Edited <time datetime="2019-04-27T19:57:23Z" title="04/27/2019 07:57  PM" data-short="5 yr">April 27, 2019</time> by HansonKerman**

The mines are actually docking ports. I unearth them and pull up the “minefield”, as well as the hill. 

My floating space hill with monolithic rocket attached.
I create a remote alcubierre bubble and move the hill onto minmus where i add a ton of armaments and stuff that no one except people protecting the hill (actually protecting it) can enter. Our minmus
I move the reactor from the pyramid mine in Total Recall to minmus and activate it. My atmosphere and molten mint flats.

I build a tower of ice cream, shielded from the sun by layers of edible cones. I dare anyone to come and destroy this monument to sugar and diabetes. 

Happy Explosions

**Edited <time datetime="2019-04-29T14:55:36Z" title="04/29/2019 02:55  PM" data-short="5 yr">April 29, 2019</time> by Alpha 360**
  
lacked signature
I use a Klamperture Science Eating Device to eat the ice cream. My flat plain.

This flat plain is what V2 was for.

My irradiated crater.

I make a new hill in a cave under the irradiated crater. Over thousands of years, rock is gradually added, and it bursts through the top.

My hill poking out through the top of an irradiated crater
You can always add one more radiator to an irradiated crater.
I detonate a nuke inside of your irradiated crater, incenerating you and everything in it. My irradiates irradiates crater.
Now the irradiated craeter has one radius more.
Cleanup crew. My crater
The crew has abandoned the crater-cleanuper.

I fill the crater with concrete and put a solitary howitzer.

My poorly defended concrete plain.
Cement was stolen during the construction. The howitser sinks in the fragile sand platform.

![screenshot224.png](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/224860633525518347/626460708061577226/screenshot224.png)

I poke an flag in the Hill, somehow on the Mun now.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-09-25T16:57:24Z" title="09/25/2019 04:57  PM" data-short="4 yr">September 25, 2019</time> by DriftedCougar**
  
Its an Hill, not an rock!

I plant a flag on top of your flag, and another flag on top of that, and sit at the top.

My precarious tower of flagpoles.

I kick over the flags.  

My hill of fallen flags.

I've carried the whole surface feature down to Kerbin.

My surface feature.

Spaceship feat. Surface

Break ~~dance~~ hill.
